wikitide-close-email-body: Hello, This email is to inform you that your WikiTide wiki has been closed. Wikis that do not receive any edits or log actions within 60 days are automatically closed to prevent spam, in accordance with the Dormancy Policy (which you agreed to when requesting a wiki). If you would like to reopen your wiki, please visit Special:ManageWiki and uncheck the "Closed" box to reopen it. Please note that if you do not reopen your wiki or if no one requests that your wiki be opened (in accordance to the reopening request section of the Dormancy Policy) within 6 months starting from now, your wiki will be marked as eligible for permanent deletion.
wikitide-close-email-subject: Your WikiTide wiki ($1) has been closed
wikitide-sitenotice-closed-locked: This wiki has been closed because [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Stewards|Stewards]] or [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Trust and Safety|Trust and Safety]] have determined that it violates WikiTide's [[wt:meta:Content Policy|Content Policy]] or other global policies. Bureaucrats should have received either an email or talk page message with more information, including how to appeal.
wikitide-sitenotice-closed-private: This wiki has been automatically closed because there have been '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 60 days. Since this wiki is private, it cannot be reopened by any user through the normal reopening request process. If this wiki is not reopened within 6 months, it may be deleted. Note: If you are a bureaucrat on this wiki, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck the "Closed" box to reopen it.
wikitide-sitenotice-closed: This wiki has been automatically [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Dormancy Policy|closed]] because there have been '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 60 days. If you are a user (who is not the bureaucrat) that wishes for this wiki to be reopened, please request that at [[wt:meta:Requests for reopening wikis|Requests for reopening wikis]]. If this wiki is not reopened within 6 months it may be deleted. Note: If you are a bureaucrat on this wiki, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck the "Closed" box to reopen it.
wikitide-sitenotice-inactive-private: This wiki has had '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 45 days and has been automatically marked as '''inactive'''. If you would like to prevent this wiki from being '''closed''', please start showing signs of activity here. If there are no signs of this wiki being used within the next 15 days. this wiki will be closed in accordance to the [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Dormancy Policy|Dormancy Policy]] (which all wiki founders accept when requesting a wiki). This wiki (being private) is not be eligible to be reopened by another user upon request as normal public wikis are. If this wiki is still inactive 135 days from now, this wiki will become eligible for '''deletion'''. Note: If you are a bureaucrat, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck "inactive" yourself.
wikitide-sitenotice-inactive: This wiki has had '''no edits''' or '''log actions''' made within the last 45 days and has been automatically marked as '''inactive'''. If you would like to prevent this wiki from being '''closed''', please start showing signs of activity here. If there are no signs of this wiki being used within the next 15 days, this wiki will be closed in accordance to the [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Dormancy Policy|Dormancy Policy]] (which all wiki founders accept when requesting a wiki). If this wiki is closed and no one reopens it 135 days from now, this wiki will become eligible for '''deletion'''. Note: If you are a bureaucrat, you can go to [[Special:ManageWiki]] and uncheck "inactive" yourself.
wikitide-survey-disabled: Sorry, the annual survey is now closed. Please come back next year. If you have any suggestions or questions please feel free to [[wt:meta:Special:Help center|contact us]].
wikitide-survey-done: Thank you for completing the survey and telling us how you use the service and what you think! If you consented to WikiTide contacting you, we will be in touch shortly. If you didn't, you can see an analysis of the survey responses after July 22nd at meta.wikitide.com!
wikitide-survey-header: Thank you for choosing WikiTide! Please take a few moments to complete the survey below to help WikiTide understand how you use the service and what you think about it. If you consent to WikiTide contacting you, your email will be stored until July 24th when it will be deleted from the survey storage. Your responses will be connected, however, your username will not be recorded along with your response. If you consent and later wish to either withdraw your consent or wish to change your email, please contact sre[at]wikiforge.net (preferably from the email you gave requesting this).
wikitide-survey-q1-account-edit: I have a registered account and I edit wiki(s).
wikitide-survey-q1-account-manage: I have a registered account, I edit wiki(s) and manage wiki(s) as well.
wikitide-survey-q1-account-read: I have a registered account however I only read wiki(s).
wikitide-survey-q1-anon-edit: I do not have an account however I edit wiki(s).
wikitide-survey-q1-anon-read: I do not have an account and I use WikiTide only to read wiki(s).
wikitide-survey-q1: Which of the following accurately describes your relationship to WikiTide?
wikitide-survey-q2: Is there any reason you do not have an account on WikiTide?
wikitide-survey-q3a: How often do you use WikiTide to read wiki(s)?
wikitide-survey-q3b: How often do you use WikiTide to edit wiki(s)?
wikitide-survey-q4a: Which of the following categories/genres/themes describe the wiki(s) you read?
wikitide-survey-q4b: Which of the following categories/genres/themes describe the wiki(s) you edit?
wikitide-survey-q5a: How many wiki(s) do you read?
wikitide-survey-q5b: How many wiki(s) do you edit?
wikitide-survey-q6-1: Now's your chance to tell us what you'd like for us to improve on our extensions. Would you like to elaborate on your reply to the above?
wikitide-survey-q6: The user interface of WikiTide-developed extensions (ManageWiki, DataDump, ImportDump) is well designed and does not have a negative impact on my WikiTide experience
wikitide-survey-q7-ci: I have a positive impression of WikiTide as a service
wikitide-survey-q7-oe: I am satisfied with my WikiTide experience
wikitide-survey-q7-reqhelp: When seeking support, my questions were answered to satisfaction
wikitide-survey-q7-si: I have a positive impression of WikiTide Site Reliability Engineering
wikitide-survey-q7-speed: I am satisfied with the recent (think, 1 to 2 weeks) speeds when using my wiki
wikitide-survey-q7-st: I have a positive impression of WikiTide Stewards
wikitide-survey-q7-tasks: Tasks I filed on Phorge were resolved to my satisfaction
wikitide-survey-q7-up: I am satisfied with WikiTide's uptime
wikitide-survey-q7-wc: The wiki I requested was created quickly
wikitide-survey-q7: Please rate the following statements on a scale of 1-5, where 1 is strongly disagree and 5 is strongly agree.
wikitide-survey-q8-c: ManageWiki provides me with the control I expect
wikitide-survey-q8-f: ManageWiki provides me with the flexibility I need
wikitide-survey-q8: Have you used ManageWiki to manage your wiki(s)?
wikitide-survey-q9: Is there any reason you chose WikiTide over other wiki hosting farms?
wikitide-survey-q11-ai: WikiTide is working on implementing Artificial Intelligence to automate creation of wikis
wikitide-survey-q11-c: WikiTide registered as a not-for-profit in November 2019 and has a Board of Directors
wikitide-survey-q11-cd: Volunteers like yourself can be elected on the Board of Directors for WikiTide through community elections
wikitide-survey-q11-d: WikiTide is funded solely through [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Donate|donations]] from people like you
wikitide-survey-q11-f: WikiTide publishes all of its [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Finance|financial information]]
wikitide-survey-q11-fd: There is currently an ongoing [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Fundraiser|fundraiser]] which you can contribute to and help!
wikitide-survey-q11-mm: WikiTide hosts [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/WikiTide Meetings|semi-monthly meetings]] where they inform the community of what's new, what's next and where they hear the thoughts, comments and concerns of the community
wikitide-survey-q11-p: WikiTide has a strong privacy stance (e.g we will never run adverts)
wikitide-survey-q11-s: WikiTide is staffed by volunteers only
wikitide-survey-q11-v: You can help WikiTide as a [[wt:meta:Special:MyLanguage/Contributing|volunteer]] in either a technical or community role
wikitide-survey-q11: Check the box next to the following which you know are true about WikiTide
wikitide-survey-q12: Do you have any issues with WikiTide which have led to a negative impact on your experience?
wikitide-survey-q13: Are there any improvements or ideas you have that would improve your WikiTide experience?
wikitide-survey-q14: Now is your chance to make any comments you'd like about WikiTide.
wikitide-survey-q15-1: You don't seem to have a [[Special:ChangeEmail|confirmed email address]]. The email address you provide below will be deleted after contact is made with you.
wikitide-survey-q15: Would you like for WikiTide to contact you to discuss your answers further?
wikitide-warnmessage: [https://meta.wikitide.com/wiki/Stewards%27_noticeboard '''WikiTide Staff'''] has noticed that this wiki has [[Special:RecentChanges|'''no edits''']] or [[Special:Logs|'''logs''']] made within the last 45 days. If you would like to prevent this wiki from being '''closed''', please start showing signs of activity here. If there are no signs of this wiki being used within the next 15 days, this wiki may be closed per the [https://meta.wikitide.com/wiki/Dormancy_Policy '''Dormancy Policy''']. This wiki will then be eligible for adoption by another user. If not adopted and still inactive 135 days from now, this wiki will become eligible for '''deletion'''. Please be sure to familiarize yourself with WikiTide's [https://meta.wikitide.com/wiki/Dormancy_Policy Dormancy Policy]. If there is activity on this wiki you can go on [[MediaWiki:Sitenotice]] and remove this notice yourself. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to [https://meta.wikitide.com/wiki/Stewards%27_noticeboard '''Contact Us'''].
wikitidemagic-description: MediaWiki messages, scripts and hooks specific for WikiTide
requestimportdump-text:
Welcome to ImportDump! To get started with your import, please fill out this form so we can review your request. Your wiki request will be reviewed by a member of Site Reliability Engineering, and it can be tracked at the page that will be given when submitting your request.

If your XML dump times out during upload, please create a task on [[Phorge]].

If you wish to import images as well, please create a task on [[Phorge]].
sitematrix-summary: This special page lists all WikiTide wikis.
vanishuser-action-label: Do you '''really''' want to vanish this user?
vanishuser-action-help: Please make sure all details are filled out correctly and make sure to log this.
vanishuser-warning: '''Warning''': You are about to globally vanish a user! Please review all details carefully before proceeding.
vanishuser-log-header: This is a basic log of all user vanishes.
